# Introduction

Trying to summarise the smooth term components from Bayesian GAM models.

# Methods

## Data Generation

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
library(dplyr)

library(mgcv)
library(gamm4)
library(rstanarm)
library(brms)

library(parameters)

# gam
model_1 <- gam::gam(Petal.Length ~ gam::s(Petal.Width, 9), data=iris)
summary(model_1)
insight::find_terms(model_1)
insight::get_parameters(model_1)

# mgcv
model_2 <- mgcv::gam(Petal.Length ~ s(Petal.Width), data=iris)
summary(model_2)
insight::find_terms(model_2)
insight::get_parameters(model_2)

# gamm4
model_3 <- gamm4::gamm4(Petal.Length ~ s(Petal.Width), data=iris)
summary(model_3)
insight::find_terms(model_3)
insight::get_parameters(model_3)

# brms
model_4 <- brms::brm(Petal.Length ~ s(Petal.Width), data=iris)
summary(model_4)
insight::find_terms(model_4)
insight::get_parameters(model_4)

# rstanarm
model_5 <- rstanarm::stan_gamm4(Petal.Length ~ s(Petal.Width), data=iris)
summary(model_5)
insight::find_terms(model_5)
insight::get_parameters(model_5)
```
